languages.text: "По крайней мере мы способны это пережить и одолеть. А у вас как дела?"
"At least we can survive it and still prevail. How does your own kind fare on that score?"
languages.original_text: "По крайней мере мы способны это пережить и одолеть. А у вас как дела?"

traits.locale_text: "At least we can survive it and prevail. How does your own kind fare on that score?"
"At least we can survive it and prevail. How does your own kind fare on that score?"
"At least we can survive it and still prevail. How does your own kind fare on that score?"
"At least we can survive it and still prevail. How does your own kind fare on that score?"
"At least we can survive it and still prevail. How does your own kind fare on that score?"
"At least we can survive it and still prevail. How does your own kind fare on that score?"
"At least we can survive it and still prevail. How does your own kind fare on that score?"

languages.text: "Zumindest können wir es überleben und noch immer siegen. Kann Euer Volk das auch von sich sagen?"
languages.original_text: "At least we can survive it and still prevail. How does your own kind fare on that score?"

traits.locale_text: "Zumindest können wir es überleben und noch immer siegen. Kann Euer Volk das auch von sich sagen?"

languages.text: « Au moins, nous avons des chances de survivre et de triompher. Vous et les vôtres, pouvez-vous en dire autant ? »
languages.original_text: "At least we can survive it and still prevail. How does your own kind fare on that score?"

traits.locale_text: « Au moins, nous avons des chances de survivre et de triompher. Vous et les vôtres, pouvez-vous en dire autant ? »

languages.text: «Por lo menos podemos sobrevivir y hasta triunfar contra ellas. ¿Cómo le va a tu pueblo en ese frente?».
languages.original_text: "At least we can survive it and still prevail. How does your own kind fare on that score?"

traits.locale_text: «Por lo menos podemos sobrevivir y hasta triunfar contra ellas. ¿Cómo le va a tu pueblo en ese frente?».

languages.text: 「少なくとも、私たちは生き残ることができる。君の種族はどうなんだ？」
languages.original_text: "At least we can survive it and still prevail. How does your own kind fare on that score?"

traits.locale_text: 「少なくとも、私たちは生き残ることができる。君の種族はどうなんだ？」

languages.text: “至少我们还能挺过来，能战胜那些噩梦。不知你们这种生物在这一点上表现如何呢？”
languages.original_text: "At least we can survive it and still prevail. How does your own kind fare on that score?"

traits.locale_text: “至少我们还能挺过来，能战胜那些噩梦。不知你们这种生物在这一点上表现如何呢？”

languages.original_text: "At least we can survive it and still prevail. How does your own kind fare on that score?"

languages.text: "En azından bunu sağ atlatıp yine de galip gelebiliriz. Soydaşların, bu hususla nasıl başa çıkıyor?"
languages.original_text: "At least we can survive it and still prevail. How does your own kind fare on that score?"
